headline: FirstEnergy Adds Fort Martin Gas Plant To Long Term Investment Story
summary: FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) subsidiaries have selected the Fort Martin site in West Virginia for a proposed 1,200-megawatt natural gas power plant. The project would expand the company’s generation portfolio and is subject to regulatory approvals and permitting. The planned facility is positioned to support regional grid reliability and customer affordability objectives over the long term. For you as an investor, this planned 1,200-megawatt plant adds detail to how FirstEnergy, a regulated...
